newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Fire erupts on cruise ship in Singapore.
newsitem.headline: Fire erupts on cruise ship in Singapore.

text.p: A fire broke out on a cruise ship just off Singapore harbour early on Saturday and there were some reports of casualties, witnesses said.
One witness, a photographer, said police had told him one person had died and eight were injured in the fire, but Singapore Marine Department officials refused immediate comment.
Officials said they were likely to issue a statement on the incident aboard the cruise ship Gemini later in the day and declined to give details immediately.
There was no immediate information on the ship or the number and nationalities of the people on board.
